colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES RJE BTZUN MA YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO BSGRUB PA'I THABS 'DI YANG, DAD PA GTONG BA DANG TSUL KHRIMS DANG RNAM DPYOD PHUN SUM TSOGS PA GRVA TSANG CHOS RJE 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYIS YANG YANG NAN CHER BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I GZIMS CHUNG YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
